sec.p: We used NDVI data from the MYD13C2 (V6) product at 0.05° resolution and a monthly time step. Fire severity as shown in Supplementary Fig. 14 was calculated as the NDVI change one year after fire (∆NDVI) between burned pixels (NDVI fire) and adjacent unburned pixels (NDVI control) at 0.05° spatial resolution (∆NDVI = NDVI fire – NDVI control). Only pixels in which QA was flagged as 0 (good data) and 1 (marginal data) were used.
